details: Anti-Death Penalty Asia Network members approved ADPAN’s Constitution and elected ADPAN’s first Executive Committee.

event: ADPAN transformed into an independent network
name: ADPAN transformed into an independent network

details: ADPAN was launched from Hong Kong following a consultative meeting organised by Amnesty International answering a call from local abolitionists to organise regionally to end the death penalty across Asia and the Pacific
